channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: TMC - Defects - Other FW6 Surface problem, 11th April
item.description:
28 day with give an take plus 15 minutes delay boards needed plus temporary footway closure needed footway abrupt level difference 900x700x25mm tarmac patch required stats required (FW6 Abrupt Level Differences)
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: The drain is blocked problem, 11th April
item.description:
Customer reports that it appears someone has poured wet concrete down the gully at location. Has dried onto the grate and also small drips going all the way down the road. Area has flooded in the past and they are concerned this will cause big issues for the drainage system on the road.
Report on FixMyStreet
